name: Jeffrey HERSON, et al., petitioners, v. CITY OF RICHMOND, CALIFORNIA.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Jeffrey HERSON, et al., petitioners,
v.
CITY OF RICHMOND, CALIFORNIA.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Reed v. Town of Gilbert, 576 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 2218, 192 L.Ed.2d 236 (2015).
casebody.head_matter:
Jeffrey HERSON, et al., petitioners,
v.
CITY OF RICHMOND, CALIFORNIA.
No. 14-1322.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 5, 2015.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Reed v. Town of Gilbert, 576 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 2218, 192 L.Ed.2d 236 (2015).
